channel.title: News Adadev
channel.description: News about posts in Adadev website.

item.title: Read and Write Images with Gdal in C#
item.description: How to read, write and create images with geographic information, in .TIF format, with the Gdal library in C#.

item.title: White Balance Algorithm with Gdal in C#
item.description: Coding simple and fast white balance algorithm on TIF images using Gdal in C#.

item.title: Creating a site with Github Pages and indexing on Google
item.description: Hosting a website on Github Pages for free and how to index its content on Google search tools.

item.title: Committing unversioned files with TortoiseSVN
item.description: How to configure TortoiseSVN to list unversioned files on commit and do not list files that should not be committed.

item.title: JSON to shapefile in C#
item.description: How to convert a file in JSON format to shapefile using Gdal in C#.

item.title: Ada Lovelace
item.description: Ada Lovelace was an English mathematician and writer, chiefly known to be the first programmer of the history.
